resources.string: Genos Accessibility Service provides enhanced input and interaction capabilities for the Genos AI assistant. This service can observe your screen content to provide contextual assistance.
Overlay permission is required for Genos to function properly.
Accessibility permission is required for Genos to observe screen content.
Service for screen capture and OCR processing to enable intelligent UI interactions.
This app requires screen capture permission to perform OCR on screen content. The captured data is processed locally and may be sent to AI services for enhanced functionality.
Accessibility permission is required for this feature.
